title: troopcoin
author: troopcoin
content: Anyone have any 3 letter or 3 character, 4 letter, or dictionary word .com's for sale? Message with domain(s) and price.

comments.author: shapetr
comments.body: Hello,If you think about it, I have a 16 years old 3 caharacter .com domain name, I can sell it.Regards.

comments.author: troopcoin
comments.body: Message me with the domain. I tried to message you, but your settings won't let new members message you.

comments.author: akaros
comments.body: Quote from: shapetr on March 24, 2023, 11:58:55 PMHello,If you think about it, I have a 16 years old 3 caharacter .com domain name, I can sell it.Regards.Please I am interested if its still available. PM me info - offer please, thank you.

comments.author: shapetr
comments.body: Quote from: troopcoin on May 03, 2023, 07:45:11 PMMessage me with the domain. I tried to message you, but your settings won't let new members message you.I can't send a pm, you can contact me via e-mail. shapedomainscontact (@) gmail.comQuote from: akaros on May 20, 2023, 04:57:09 PMQuote from: shapetr on March 24, 2023, 11:58:55 PMHello,If you think about it, I have a 16 years old 3 caharacter .com domain name, I can sell it.Regards.Please I am interested if its still available. PM me info - offer please, thank you.I can't send a pm, you can contact me via e-mail. shapedomainscontact (@) gmail.com

comments.author: AntKB
comments.body: Hello I have a 2 word game dot com.Reply if you interested? Thanks.

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: Probably a bit old to reply but I know the following are all under $10000 1x4x.com3emw.combmd5.comcas8.comnewcue.com (6 letters but 2 words)vipdrives.com (8 letters but 2 words)Have seen traffic on all of them. -Dave
